[vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/6″][vc_column_text]

We believe everyone should have access to a caregiver of their choice, control over their daily schedule, and specialized care services to support their daily individual needs.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_separator color=”custom” border_width=”2″ accent_color=”#34beb9″][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/6″][vc_column_text]Enhanced Carers will provide the following home care programs at flexible schedules and cost-friendly service rates.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/6″][vc_column_text]

Quote calculator

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/4″]

Home Care Services

When someone you love is ill, finding high-quality care is your top priority. At Enhanced Carers, we understand that being in a familiar environment can enhance the quality of life and help to preserve dignity. That’s why we’re committed to providing compassionate, reliable, in-home professional assistance.

Home Care Services

Continue
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
Hospital Private Care

As much as we would like our loved ones to be cared for in the privacy and security of their own homes, they may need attention requiring the services of a nursing home, retirement residence, rehabilitation, or long-term care facility.

Hospital Private Care

Continue
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
Facility Staffing

Although hospitals, nursing homes, and other long-term health care facilities are facing budget constraints like never before, we know that providing the highest quality of care for your patients is always your top priority. To help you make sure you have the skilled staff needed to provide outstanding patient care.

Facility Staffing

Continue
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″]
Transportation Services

Helping you get where you need to go.

Enhanced Carers Transport is more than just taking you to and from those urgent medical appointments, we are here to help you retain your personal freedom and get you back in touch with your local community.

Our fleet of vehicles includes busses, people movers and small four-door cars to meet your needs.

Transportation Services

Continue
[vc_empty_space height=”30px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” el_id=”calculator” css=”.vc_custom_1490257151074{margin-top: 50px !important;padding-top: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-color: #41294a !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]

Quote calculator

If you require services on a public holiday, overnight services or live-in services, please call (617) 655-9788 so we can discuss prices with you.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″]

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”30″][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]

    Frequently asked questions

    [/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”30px”][vc_toggle title=”Why Choose Enhanced Carers?” style=”rounded” el_id=”1490242978106-760cc7fc-bf5b”]Enhanced Carers has a dedicated team of professionals with skills and experience across the Aged Care and Disability industries, we provide services through, Home Care Packages and private arrangements. We have the flexibility and knowledge to be responsive to your needs at all times. We offer a complimentary in home assessment and can guide you through various ways of receiving support appropriate for you. From your first point of contact with Enhanced Cares, you will always speak with a caring team member who will focus on the best way to meet your needs.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What Can We Talk About on The Consultation?” style=”rounded” el_id=”1490243017590-81e6f18c-f765″]Before you decide to use our Home Care services, we recommend that you take part in an initial consultation with us. This gives us the chance to talk about your needs and what exactly you are looking for in a home care service. It’s also a chance for one of our team to discuss our services thoroughly with you so that you understand exactly what you can expect once you do start receiving care from us.
    Are you interested in booking your first consultation with us? If so, give us a call to and one of our team will be happy to arrange it.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”How Does Enhanced Carers Attract The Best Caregivers?” style=”rounded” el_id=”1490243071099-ac6ed0e6-55f5″]Our Golden Rule states ‘We will not refer a caregiver into your home that we would not welcome into our own home.’ This high bar was set by our founder and is the backbone of our mission. Similar to any working professional, caregivers are attracted to organizations that have trust, compassion, stability, and hope. We encourage you to meet one of our local Directors or Referral Specialists as they will treat you with as much compassion and dignity as they afford to each caregiver they refer.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What Services Does Enhanced Carers Provide?” el_id=”1490243127725-dd1597f6-8c35″]We offer a variety of supports, depending on what you need. Enhanced Carers services can include:

    • Personal Care
    • Light Housework
    • Nursing
    • Meal Preparation
    • Transport
    • Respite – in home/ accommodation
    • Support Coordination
    • Supported Independent Living
    • And many more!

    [/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Will We Have a Choice in Selecting The Caregiver” style=”rounded” el_id=”1490243162324-875c86fc-1966″]Our Care Pairing Process works with each family to understand what unique skills and personality are desired in a caregiver. Feedback from satisfied clients usually indicates that a personality match is the #1 factor in a caregiver match, so we highly encourage client input. We will then make a referral based on our experience and your input.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Can I Switch From Current Provider to Enhanced Carers?” el_id=”1490243187993-e598bea4-1caa”]Of course! Get in touch with our team today and they’ll talk you through the process and how we can work with you to maximize your package.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”75px”]
